messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "rise of the tezlas".

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A heavy electrical storm is coming in. Random APC's may overload, and possibly explode! Take cover immediately!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We believe the storm has passed. Please repair any damage to the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in rise of the tezlas's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
